atmosphere.title: Our Circle's Atmosphere
atmosphere.description: Imagine: a crackling campfire casting soft highlights on friends' faces. The guitar passes from hand to hand, and everyone can share their favorite melody or simply listen, singing along to familiar lines. There's no stage or auditorium here â€” just a circle of equals, united by music and the desire to be heard.
atmosphere.quote: In our campfire circle, you'll hear both original songs you won't hear anywhere else and beloved hits that make you want to sing along.

live_music.title: Live Music
live_music.description: No microphones or amplifiers, just the pure sound of guitar strings and voices

conversations.title: Heartfelt Conversations
conversations.description: Between songs â€” about travels, dreams, life

tea.title: Warm Tea
tea.description: And simple treats that make the evening even cozier

perform.title: Performance Opportunity
perform.description: Sing your favorite song or listen to others

friendly.title: Friendly Atmosphere
friendly.description: Here everyone will find like-minded people

rules.title: Our Campfire Rules
rules.memorize: We ask you to perform songs from memory â€” let your eyes meet the listeners' eyes, not the phone screen.
rules.alternate: Alternate your original compositions with well-known ones â€” this way it will be more interesting for everyone.
rules.sincere: And most importantly â€” sing from the heart, because it's sincerity that makes our circle special.

for_whom.title: Who This Evening Is For
for_whom.description: It doesn't matter if you can play guitar or just dream of learning. Musicians and listeners, experienced bards and timid beginners are welcome here. The only thing needed is the desire to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of genuine human communication.
for_whom.conclusion: Come as you are, with that song in your heart that you want to share with others. After all, the most precious memories are born precisely on such evenings â€” when the guitar sounds under the open sky, and hearts are open to each other.

bring.title: Bring With You
bring.description: Good mood and your favorite mug for tea

schedule.title: Guitar Circle Schedule
schedule.time: Guitar circles are held every Sunday at 20:00
schedule.description: Come to us for a soulful evening with guitar and good company!

booking.title: Book a Guitar Circle
booking.description: To book and get detailed information about the upcoming guitar circle, visit our Telegram group

description.title: Board Games at North Republic
description.text: Our collection includes games for every taste: from strategic battles to fun parties. Everyone will find something to their liking â€” whether you're a fan of logical puzzles or a lover of fun gatherings with friends.

mafia.title: Mafia â€” Classic Genre
mafia.description: Eternal battle between honest citizens and cunning mafia. During the day everyone sleeps peacefully, but at night... Who can identify the criminals and stay alive?
mafia.quote: A game of psychology, bluffing, and persuasion skills.

hitler.title: Secret Hitler â€” Political Intrigues
hitler.description: Germany 1930s: liberals against fascists in a dramatic struggle for power. Fascists know each other, liberals are in the minority, and Hitler himself knows no one!
hitler.quote: Every law can be fatal, every vote â€” fateful.

bunker.title: Bunker â€” Survival at Any Cost
bunker.description: The world is on the brink of disaster, shelter space is limited. Everyone has their own profession, characteristics, baggage. Prove that you deserve salvation!
bunker.quote: Persuade, argue, intrigue â€” like in the movie "The Philosophers: Survival Lesson".

shakal.title: Shakal â€” Pirate Treasures
shakal.description: Become a pirate ship captain! Explore the mysterious island, search for treasures, fight rivals and beware of traps.
shakal.quote: Every game is a new adventure with a unique island map.

jenga.title: Jenga â€” Tower on the Edge
jenga.description: Classic game of hand steadiness and nerve strength. Carefully remove wooden blocks and place them on top.
jenga.quote: The main thing â€” don't let the tower collapse! Each move increases the stakes.

kittens.title: Exploding Kittens â€” Russian Roulette with Cats
kittens.description: Cute kittens can be... explosive! Draw cards from the deck, but pray not to get a booby-trapped kitten.
kittens.quote: Use "laser pointers" and "catnip" for defusing. Super-fast games, simple rules, maximum fun!

uno.title: UNO â€” Colorful Classic
uno.description: Discard cards by color or value, use special cards to attack opponents.
uno.quote: Don't forget to shout "UNO!" when you have one card left! A game of attention, speed, and a bit of luck.

monopoly.title: Monopoly â€” Battle for Empire
monopoly.description: Buy real estate, build hotels, collect rent and bankrupt opponents!
monopoly.quote: Classic economic strategy where luck meets calculation, and friendship is tested for strength.

refreshments.title: Tea, Coffee, Snacks
refreshments.description: To keep the brain working at full capacity

why_play.title: Why Play Board Games?
why_play.description: Board games are live communication without gadgets, testing strategic thinking and acting skills. This is a place where you can discover friends from a new side and make new acquaintances.

cta.title: Ready to Play?
cta.description: Come alone or with company â€” there's always a table and partners for the game. In the world of board games, every evening can become an unforgettable adventure!
cta.quote: We explain the rules of all games on the spot. No experience required â€” just the desire to play and win!

quests.title: Quests - Exciting Adventures
quests.subtitle: Immerse yourself in captivating stories and solve puzzles in our quest rooms

about.title: About Quests
about.paragraph1: Our quests are interactive adventures where you become the main character of an exciting story. Together with friends or family, you will solve riddles, search for clues and solve puzzles.
about.paragraph2: Each quest is unique and has its own atmosphere - from detective stories to fantasy adventures. All rooms are equipped with modern technology and quality decorations.
about.paragraph3: Our experienced actors will help you fully immerse yourself in the game atmosphere and make your adventure unforgettable.

how.title: How the quest works
how.paragraph1: Choose a suitable quest and book a time. Come 10-15 minutes before the start to familiarize yourself with the rules and receive instructions.
how.paragraph2: Together with your team, you will enter a themed room and begin your adventure. You will have limited time to solve all the riddles and escape from the room.
how.paragraph3: Our hosts monitor the process and give hints when necessary to keep the game interesting and exciting.

cta.title: Ready for adventure?
cta.description: Book a quest now and get unforgettable impressions!

lasertag.title: Lasertag - Laser Battle
lasertag.subtitle: Exciting team game with laser weapons for children and adults

about.title: About Lasertag
about.paragraph1: Players are divided into teams, take laser weapons and wear headbands with sensors. The goal of the game is to hit the opponent's sensors with an infrared pulse emitted from the weapon.
about.paragraph2: This eliminates the risk of injury from "shots" as hits are registered by electronics built into the sensors. The infrared radiation used in the game is completely safe for eyes and skin.
about.paragraph3: Experienced game hosts monitor the match to ensure rules are followed and all players stay safe.

how.title: How the game works
how.paragraph1: After booking the game, you arrive at the scheduled time. An instructor will meet you and fully guide your event.
how.paragraph2: They will help you settle in the lounge area, explain everything and act as a referee during matches.
how.paragraph3: For an exciting game, at least six players are needed to form 3v3 teams. The more players, the more fun!

cta.title: Ready for battle?
cta.description: Book your game now and get ready for an incredible adventure!

archerytag.title: Archery Tag - Bow Battle
archerytag.subtitle: Exciting team game with bows and soft arrows for all ages

about.title: About Archery Tag
about.paragraph1: Simply put - this is an analogue of paintball, but with bows and soft arrows instead of paint balls. Your task is to be fast, agile and accurate!

advantages.title: Archery Tag Advantages
advantages.point1: Fun for everyone: Regardless of your fitness level or experience, Archery Tag is suitable for all ages and skills. We will teach you everything and show you everything.
advantages.point2: Develops endurance: Shooting at running targets that also shoot back!
advantages.point4: Great idea for leisure or celebration!

how.title: How the game works
how.paragraph1: After booking the game, you arrive at the scheduled time. An instructor will meet you and fully guide your event.
how.paragraph2: They will help you settle in the lounge area, explain everything and act as a referee during matches.
how.paragraph3: For an exciting game, at least eight players are needed to form teams. The more players, the more fun!

cta.title: Ready for bow battle?
cta.description: Book your game now and get ready for an incredible adventure!

bbq_zone.title: BBQ Picnic Area - Barbecue Zone
bbq_zone.subtitle: Perfect place to relax with friends, family or colleagues

about.title: About BBQ Zone
about.paragraph1: Perfect place to gather with friends, family or colleagues â€” our gazebos in the middle of a green corner of nature.
about.paragraph2: One such zone can comfortably accommodate up to 35 people. The cost also includes a barbecue area with a grill and sink.
about.paragraph3: Please note: Meat, drinks, food, grills, skewers, dishes and other consumables â€” bring with you. But we will always tell you where to buy them nearby. You can buy charcoal from us.
about.paragraph4: Hourly rental â€” choose the time that suits you. You can combine with laser tag or bow battle games, or just arrange a soulful evening in the open air.

cta.title: Ready for a picnic?
cta.description: Book your barbecue area now and get ready for great relaxation!

cinema.title: Cinema Under the Stars
cinema.subtitle: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an evening movie screening under the tropical sky

about.title: About Cinema
about.paragraph1: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an evening movie screening under the tropical sky, where every frame comes alive in the soft light of stars and the twinkling of the city night.
about.paragraph2: Our cozy venue is equipped with large umbrellas and elegant gazebos so that not a drop of rain will spoil the viewing.
about.paragraph3: A wide projection screen is hung between exotic palm trees, and soft bean bags and pillows right on the grass allow you to comfortably settle under the open sky.

how.title: How the screening works
how.paragraph1_before: Movies are chosen by you in our
how.paragraph1_after: â€” just suggest and vote for your favorite films!
how.paragraph2: Screening starts: at sunset. Sound without headphones: natural acoustics of a tropical evening.
how.paragraph3: Any weather: umbrellas and gazebos will hide from the rain, and a slightly cool breeze will only add freshness.

cta.title: Ready for cinema under the stars?
cta.description: Come and become part of our cinema community, where every evening gives unforgettable impressions under the starry sky of Nha Trang!

yoga.title: Yoga at GameZone
yoga.subtitle: Awaken the energy of the day. Start your morning with strength, end your day in harmony

about.title: About our classes
about.description: Immerse yourself in a holistic practice where Hatha and Kundalini yoga combine with body therapy, energy practices and sound healing.
about.point1: Every morning is an opportunity to activate your inner sun and reach a new level of self-awareness
about.point2: Scientific approach with the soul of India from a teacher who has trained in the heart of ashtanga yoga
about.point3: Achieving peace of mind, body flexibility and inner stability through regular practice

morning.title: Morning Kundalini Yoga
morning.point1: Yoga for the whole body â€” awakening every cell
morning.point3: Kundalini practices for energy activation and block release
morning.point5: Cosmic Shavasana with singing bowl vibrations
morning.point6: Deep meditation to awaken inner light
morning.point7: Mantras for restoration and inner harmony

evening.title: Evening Hatha Yoga
evening.description: Scientific approach with the soul of India
evening.point2: Scientific approach: biomechanics, proper breathing, strength development
evening.point3: Achieving peace of mind, body flexibility and inner stability

conditions.title: For whom and what to bring

for_who.title: For whom our classes
for_who.description: Suitable for beginners and experienced practitioners. Perfect for energy restoration, stress relief, deep body reboot and finding inner harmony

additional.title: Additional practices
additional.description: Ecstatic Dance â€” we periodically hold ecstatic dance sessions, dance without rules and restrictions, where you can express yourself through movement

what_to_bring.title: What to bring with you
what_to_bring.description: Comfortable practice clothes, water, open heart and readiness for changes. How you start your morning is how you will live the whole day!

cta.title: Ready to find harmony?
cta.description: Find harmony of body and spirit in the tropical paradise of Nha Trang with GameZone! All details about schedule, cost and registration for classes in our Telegram group.
